title: 2000 Four Winns Horizon 220 Boat with 2000 Trailer
item_description:
2000 Four Winns Horizon 220 Boat with 2000 Trailer

Boat Specifications

  • Year: 2000
  • Vessel HULL#: FWNMF008G900
  • CF License: CF0564PE
    • Expiration Date: 12/31/2025
  • Make: Four Winns
  • Model: Horizon 220
  • Type: Power
  • Class: FX
  • Length: 22 Feet
  • Hull Material: Plastic

2000 Four Winns Trailer Specifications:

  • VIN #: 42KBBVT29Y2010012
  • License #: 1HV2734
    • Expiration Date: 7/31/2027
  • Year: 2000
  • Mfg: Four Winns

Engine Specifications

  • Engine Year: 2000
  • Engine Make: Volvo Penta V8
  • Engine Model: 5.7
  • Fuel Type: Gas
  • Engine Type: Single I/O
  • Engine Power: 320
  • Seller States:
    • Brand new tires on trailer.
    • Boat only has 66 hours on it.
    • Some upholstery wear and needs a new fuel pump.
    • Exterior spotless.
    • Must see to really appreciate.

Note:Â Certificate of Titles (for boat and trailer), and Transfer Forms will be mailed 1-2 weeks after the removal. Buyer is fully responsible for all aspects of transfer, registration, taxes, and fees due to the California DMV.
